pr_title: Fix null pointer exception during producing flow dump

timeline.message: Fix null pointer exception during producing flow dump

timeline.bodyText:
2 questions:

How are the changes in this file related to the title "NPE during producting flow dump"?
What benefits do these changes bring? IMHO, 2 iterators instead of an index are neither shorter nor clearer.
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko

replies.bodyText:
The only reason I touch this code is to remove call flow.isForward(flowPath) because this call produces an incorrect answer for "extra/detached" paths (we inject such path now into RevertResourceAllocationAction). All other changes related to this one... I have tried to make it simpler, looks like I have failed this target.
If you insist I will revert iteration by indexes.
replies.author: surabujin
